articles.author: Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: Six small lifestyle changes for a healthier heart, according to a cardiologist - The Indian Express
articles.description: Heart disease is preventable with small, consistent daily habits. Discover six simple changes, like staying active, eating a heart-healthy diet, quitting smoking, and prioritizing sleep, that can significantly improve cardiovascular health and reduce the risk…
articles.content: Heart disease remains one of the leading causes of health complications worldwide, but prevention doesnt always require drastic lifestyle changes. Small, consistent adjustments to daily habits can si… [+3316 chars]
